item.description:
BLUSH proudly presents:

LEZBERADOS!!!!!
Comedy Show
... Doors Open at 7pm
...Show Starts at 8:00 pm
Tickets $20 pre-sale, $25.00 at the door so buy your tickets NOW

http://www.blushboston.com /events/lezberados-comedy- show-with-sandra-valls-mimi-gonzale/

With funny women, Sandra Valls and Mimi Gonzalez, they are going to make you laugh until you cry and then laugh again. Introducing the sounds of Andrea Paquin before the show.

Lezberados is a fierce and funny, hot and spicy, side-splitting comedy show featuring two of the hottest dykes on the mic working the circuit!

From Showtime's The Latin Divas of Comedy and Pride: Gay and Lesbian Comedy Slam SANDRA VALLS brings the talent and the funny to show why she was voted one of Curve Magazine's top 10 funniest lesbian comics. She's joined by her radically ridiculous sister from a different mister, Logo's "One Night Stand-Up, MIMI GONZALEZ! Both are Olivia Cruise stars performing to sold-out shows from Provincetown to L.A. Come out and get your laugh on!

LEZBERADOS!!!!!
Comedy Show
Doors Open at 7pm
...Show Starts at 8:00 pm
Tickets $20 pre-sale, $25.00 at the door so buy your tickets NOW

http://www.blushboston.com /events/lezberados-comedy- show-with-sandra-valls-mimi-gonzale/
item.name: Lezberado Comedy Show
